name: sanghanet
description: This package exists only to hold eslint and It's dependency

scripts.dev: sed -i 's/DEV_SERVER.*/DEV_SERVER = 1/' server/.env.atlas; concurrently "cd client && npm start" "cd server && npm run atlas"
scripts.dev-local: concurrently "cd client && npm start" "cd server && npm run local"
scripts.build: sed -i 's/DEV_SERVER.*/DEV_SERVER = 0/' server/.env.atlas; cd client; npm run build; cd ../server; npm run atlas
